text: TechMart product categories: Laptops & Computers - Business laptops, gaming laptops, desktop computers, workstations (brands: Dell, HP, Lenovo, ASUS, Acer, Apple MacBook); Smartphones & Tablets - iPhone, Samsung Galaxy, Xiaomi, tablets for work and entertainment; Accessories - Cases, screen protectors, chargers, cables, power banks, keyboards, mice; Audio - Headphones, earbuds, speakers (Sony, JBL, Bose, AirPods); Gaming - PlayStation 5, Xbox Series X|S, Nintendo Switch, gaming chairs, controllers; Smart Home - Smart speakers, security cameras, smart bulbs, home automation; Networking - Routers, WiFi extenders, network cables.

TechMart stores in Cuenca: 1) TechMart Mall - Location: Mall del RÃ­o, 2nd floor, Store 205; Hours: Monday to Sunday 10:00 AM - 9:00 PM; Services: Technical support desk, gaming demo area, Apple authorized service; Phone: (07) YYY-YYYY. 2) TechMart Downtown - Location: Ave. Solano and Calle YYYY, Main Street; Hours: Monday to Saturday 9:00 AM - 7:00 PM, Sunday 10:00 AM - 6:00 PM; Services: Repair center, custom PC building; Phone: (07) YYY-YYYY. Both locations offer free parking and technical consultation.

TechMart offers delivery service throughout Cuenca and nationwide shipping. Order via our website www.techmart-example.com, WhatsApp +593 99 YYY YYYY, or visit our stores. Cuenca delivery: Free for orders over $100, otherwise $5 shipping fee. Delivery time: 24-48 hours. Nationwide shipping: Costs vary by location, delivery in 3-5 business days via courier service. Online payment: Credit/debit cards, bank transfer, PayPal. Cash on delivery available for Cuenca only. Track your order in real-time through our app.

TechMart warranty and support: All products include manufacturer's warranty - Laptops & computers: 1 year, Smartphones: 1 year, Accessories: 6 months. Extended warranty available for purchase (up to 3 years additional coverage). Free technical support for first 30 days includes setup assistance, software installation, troubleshooting. Repair services available at Downtown location with certified technicians for hardware and software issues. Support channels: In-store, phone support Mon-Sat 9AM-7PM, email support@techmart-example.com (response within 24 hours), WhatsApp technical assistance.

TechMart promotions and financing: Monthly tech deals with discounts up to 40% on selected items. Student discount: 10% off laptops and tablets with valid student ID. Trade-in program: Exchange your old device for credit towards new purchase. Financing options: 0% interest installments on purchases over $300 (3, 6, 9, or 12 months with participating credit cards). Loyalty program: Earn points on every purchase, redeem for discounts. Follow us on social media for flash sales and exclusive online deals. Back to school promotion (January-February): Special prices on laptops and tablets.

TechMart gaming department: We stock the latest gaming consoles - PlayStation 5 (digital and disc editions), Xbox Series X and Series S, Nintendo Switch and Switch OLED. Popular games available for all platforms. Gaming accessories: Controllers, headsets, racing wheels, gaming chairs, RGB keyboards and mice. Pre-order upcoming game releases. Gaming laptop selection from ASUS ROG, MSI, Lenovo Legion. VR headsets: Meta Quest, PlayStation VR2. Retro gaming: Classic consoles and games. Gaming tournaments and demos held monthly at Mall location. Trade-in your old games and consoles.
